alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:25PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lincoln, southwestern Newberry, northwestern Edgefield, northern Saluda and McCormick Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 825 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Lake Greenwood State Park to Nancy Hart State Park. Movement was east at 40 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Strom Thurmond Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saluda, McCormick, Elijah Clark State Park, Mccormick County Airport, Lake Strom Thurmond, Bobby Brown State Park, Lake Greenwood, Bordeaux, Good Hope, Hollywood Elementary School, Curry Hill, Chappells Fire Station, Chennault, Long Cane Creek Picnic Area, Hickory Knob State Resort Park, Gill`s Point, Hester`s Ferry Campground, Mount Carmel, Baker Creek State Park and Leroy`s Ferry Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
